content.description: Follows the obvious crack on King Chase Rock to the right of The Chaser. Right before small prominent dihedral is some Choss! You get good pro before it.
content.location: To the left of The Chaser.

climbs.name: The Chaser
climbs.fa: Mikey Draewell and Michael Madsen (  Winter 2010)

content.description: Work up the chimmney using cracks on both sides to set gear. Top has a mild overhang flake. Work straight threw it.
content.protection: basic setup cracks gobble up alot.

content.description: King Chase Rock is down past beer tower and Drunken Garland wall. If I remember right it is the next tiny cove like indent in the wall after Drunken Garland. offers a few beautiful crack climbs and a chimney. You can climb this year round there is a nice size ledge you can rappel down to and then start back up.
